title: Script with distinct uppercase F
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701104533im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled-1_4727.jpg)

Trying to identify the script font in this photo. Appreciate any help!

Font: 

 Amplify 

Solved By: 

 [bowfinpw](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701104533/http:/typophile.com/user/2088 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Untitled-1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701104533/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled-1_139.jpg) | 83.48 KB |
author: casey6

comments.content:
Looks like [Amplify](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701104533/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mawns/amplify/?refby=bowfin) by Mans Greback.

- Mike Yanega
That's definitely it. Thanks so much!

**[Amplify](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701104533/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mawns/amplify/)** by Måns Grebäck [Aring Typeface AB, 2013]

PS: Late :)

But you did get all the right accent marks in his name :)

- Mike Yanega
